_description: A couplet in Nicholas Bozon’s Contes moralisés

BLAdd46919.Transcription: If the lourd biddes floþe stiward biddes blo

GraysInn12.Transcription:
ffor ȝif þe louerd byddyth sleþe stewward byddes
                    fle
